name: Mutated Meals
description:
Due to a virus, the vegetables growing on mars have mutated. And the population is running out of food.

Go out there and start murdering those moving mutated meals before the base dies of hunger.

It's in space and also there are carrots and also it's kind of connected to a base

I joined this game jam because I wanted to make a very simple top down shooter, the way I coded this is jank but it works and it works decently so I'm happy
